jstockfish

Class Uci

  • java.lang.Object
    • jstockfish.Uci

  • public class Uci
extends java.lang.Object

    This class contains commands that mimic UCI commands.

    go, ponderhit, bench, and perft are async. Use setOutputListener to capture the results. Others are sync, they return results immediately.

    Stockfish can't process multiple games at a time. User of this class should handle synchronization.
